summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Section 19.2 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to include houseboats in established moorages as uses permitted outright in the Manufacturing (M) Zone and dividing said section into sections designated Sections 19.20 through 19.26; amending Section 19.3 of the Zoning Ordinance to include houseboat moorages and multiple dwellings as uses conditionally permitted in said M Zone and dividing said section into sections designated Sections 19.30 through 19.32; and amending Section 19.6 of the Zoning Ordinance to modify the bulk requirements for residential structures in the M Zone and dividing said section into sections designated Sections 19.60 through 19.63.
